entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having trouble with the spell Wingardium Leviosa and being in a bad temper by the end of the class. He is also shown to be snarling at Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as correcting Ron's pronunciation of the spell Wingardium Leviosa and successfully casting it. She is also shown to be in tears after overhearing Ron's comment about her.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is described as clapping and praising Hermione for successfully casting the spell Wingardium Leviosa.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as watching Ron and Hermione try to cast the spell Wingardium Leviosa and overhearing Ron's comment about Hermione. He also catches a glimpse of Hermione's face and sees that she is in tears.

entities.name: wingardium leviosa
entities.description: The spell Wingardium Leviosa is described as being difficult for Ron to cast correctly, but successfully cast by Hermione.

relationships.description: Ron expresses his dislike of Hermione and thinks she's a nightmare.
Harry is concerned about Hermione after seeing her in tears.
